name: Licorice Pizza: Mint Shaved Ice
desc: After an ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG to the attacked target equal to 50% of the attacker's ATK. When dealing "Aftertaste" DMG, additionally triggers 1 instance of "Aftertaste" DMG at a ratio of 15%.
enhanced_desc: After an ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG to the attacked target equal to 75% of the attacker's ATK. When dealing "Aftertaste" DMG, additionally triggers 1 instance of "Aftertaste" DMG at a ratio of 20%.
